Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: ~kchristidis I have added a list of items which was pushed and merged into master while not available on v1.4.0 branch. I know we discussed to skip the migration, listed it here only for completeness.

Action.body: Commits related to the Raft has been back ported to release-1.4 branch and available now on gerrit
